casebody.data:
State
v.
John Frede Sabbaghrabaiotti 291P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 10, 2016 Mark Montgomery, Attorney at Law, for Sabbaghrabaiotti, John Frede. Sherri Lawrence, Assistant Attorney General, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th of August 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th of August 2016."
